channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Focused Elon Musk Just Helped Tesla Secure a Record Quarter
item.description: Tesla now sits on a record $41 billion cash pile.

item.title: Why pricing is now a top strategic priority for CFOs
item.description: Ninety-five percent of finance chiefs have adjusted their pricing strategies in the past six months, a Deloitte survey finds.

item.title: Halfway Through Her TED Talk, This Neuroscientist Blanked Out. What She Did Next Was Perfect

item.title: Nike’s new Air Milano is a winter coat that inflates like an air mattress
item.description: Even in the age of electric cars and AI generated everything, we’re still using the same three technologies to insulate most of our clothing. And they...

item.title: Melania Trump memecoin team ‘weaponized fame to disarm diligence’ in sprawling crypto conspiracy, alleges court filing
item.description: A new legal filing reveals new details of an alleged memecoin scheme involving the First Lady.

item.title: Nike Mind is a calming shoe that sorta, almost makes you meditate
item.description: It looks like I’m walking on Nerf darts. Twenty-two foam nubs protrude from the bottom of this shoe. When I slide it on, it almost feels like I’m walk...

item.title: Most Small Businesses Are Using AI for Ads. What’s Working, According to a Google Exec
item.description: Selin Song, Google’s president of customer solutions, shares how small businesses are using AI to level up and unlock new revenue streams.

item.title: U.S. national debt skyrockets past $38 trillion, the Treasury Department reports

item.title: Paramount Skydance is in the lead for the Warner Bros Discovery deal. Here’s why

item.title: Tesla stock sinks today after earnings miss. Elon Musk seems more focused on building a ‘robot army’
item.description: On Wednesday, October 22, Tesla released its third-quarter earnings with a side of begging from CEO Elon Musk. The report and subsequent investors’ ca...

item.title: Bank boss says the Gen Z job crisis is real—they did what society asked, got degrees, and still face rejection: ‘They’re not built to withstand that’
item.description: “Too many young people were steered into debt-funded degrees with promises that no longer hold true,” banking boss Quentin Nason slammed higher educat...

item.title: Elon Musk defends $1 trillion pay package: ‘I just don’t feel comfortable building a robot army here and then being ousted’

item.title: How to Turning Fractional Leadership Into Full Teamship
item.description: Fractional leadership only works when it operates as one system, not a collection of experts.

item.title: FedEx’s Use of AI Chatbots Is the Worst Thing a Company Could Do to Its Customers
item.description: Forcing your customers to interact with AI might seem like a good idea, but no one wants this.

item.title: Here are the 4 pillars of Trump’s growing crypto empire—and the key people running the show
item.description: It’s widely known the Trump family is cashing in on crypto, but few people are aware of how their business operations are structured.
